SELECT p.*, COUNT(c.comment_id) AS commentCount FROM COMMUNITY_POST p LEFT JOIN community_comment c ON p.post_id = c.post_id AND c.comment_visible = 1
AND p.post_type = 'COMMUNITY'
AND p.category = #{category}
AND p.category != '개인정보동의'
AND p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND p.post_visible = #{visible}
GROUP BY p.post_id
ORDER BY p.views DESC
ORDER BY commentCount DESC
ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT p.* FROM COMMUNITY_POST p WHERE p.post_id = #{postId} AND p.post_type = 'COMMUNITY'
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY_POST SET post_visible = #{postVisible}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND post_type = 'COMMUNITY'
